timeline.bodyText: Implementation change that will require reviewing. With Java 11-compatible version of Hibernate we can no longer use the old approach of mixing named and positional parameters in the same query. (Note there are a number of tests, especially integration tests, that test this new implementation didn't affect the ultimate behaviour).
timeline.author: danlysiak

timeline.message: Switch Hazelcast back to pre-11 state
RDM-8788 - Cleanup and JVM args for Hazelcast
Revert unrelated changes to Java 11; tidy up
Add jvmArgs for Hazelcast in tests

timeline.bodyText:
List<Criterion> criterion --> List<Criterion> criteria
criterion.forEach(criteria --> criteria.forEach(criterion
timeline.author: MSancaktutar

timeline.bodyText: swap use of plural and singular of identifiers.
